span.font: Parents Please Notice
Parents please click on the 'Follett ISD COVID-19 Updates' link above and read the document at the bottom of the page labeled 'COVID-19 Home Learning Grading Procedures.' Thank You!
Follett ISD Family Check In

We want to know how you are doing and the best way to support you and your child(ren) during this time. Please fill out this brief survey to help us help YOU! I want to thank you in advance for taking the time to complete this.
https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/JPPX7RP
Lunch Distribution Notice

Starting on Monday, April 6th we will distribute ALL lunches for the week from 8:00-9:00 am, and Miss Trudy will deliver meals at 9:00 am. Please bring a basket or tote since these will be the lunches for the entire week. This will assist with social distancing efforts.
Lets Stand Apart to Work Together

The Follett community must work together to fight COVID-19. Head to http://tea.texas.gov/staywell for vitally important public health guidance to stop the spread. If we stand apart as a community now, we will be together again soon.
Follett ISD School Closure Being Extended

Given the rapidly evolving situation with COVID-19, Follett ISD will extend the suspension of normal district operations through May 1st in an effort support our nation’s need to slow the spread of the novel coronavirus, or COVID-19. Our health officials report that cases are continuing to spread in the state, and an increase in confirmed cases in our county seems likely. Suspending operations for this length of time will allow us to determine, in coordination with local health officials, whether the virus is continuing to have community spread or whether it has been contained. Please see the Follett ISD School Closure Being Extended document under Parent Resources for more information.
Meals Available -Parents Please Note!

Follett ISD students who live in Higgins or Darrouzett will pick up meals in their local communities. The same also applies to students that live in Follett but attend school in Darrouzett; they will pick up meals from Follett ISD. Children must be present at the time of pick up. Please see Meals Available under Parents Resources for times and dates.
Letter to Follett ISD Parents
All Follett ISD Parents, please see the 'Letter to Follett ISD Parents' under For Parents Resources.
COVID-19 School Closure

Today Governor Abbott issued an Executive Order stating all schools in Texas are required to close beginning March 23, 2020 through April 3, 2020 in response to containing the spread of the novel coronavirus, or COVID-19. Additionally, all extracurricular activities, practices and athletic events are suspended until May 4, 2020.
Please see the COVID-19 School Closure under PARENT Resources.
Title 1 Parent Survey
Parents please take our 'Title 1 Parent Survey' that is found under the Parents Resources. Thank you.
Follett Athletic Honors 2018-19
Check out the Follett Athletic Honors 2018-19 document under Parents Resources.
Order your yearbooks online!
Link is http://jostensyearbooks.com?REF=A08245700
"Like" Follett ISD on Facebook!
Stay up to date with current information regarding FISD fundraisers, events and more!
